languages.text: "Дай людям отгоревать. Леди Теодора была с нами столь долго... что начала казаться бессмертной".
"Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."
languages.original_text: "Дай людям отгоревать. Леди Теодора была с нами столь долго... что начала казаться бессмертной".

traits.locale_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “让人们多哀悼一会吧。西奥多拉夫人已经和我们在一起太久了，我们甚至开始以为她永远都不会死。”
languages.original_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."

traits.locale_text: “让人们多哀悼一会吧。西奥多拉夫人已经和我们在一起太久了，我们甚至开始以为她永远都不会死。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Laissez ces gens faire leur deuil. Dame Théodora était là depuis tellement longtemps que c'était à se demander si elle n'était pas immortelle. »
languages.original_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez ces gens faire leur deuil. Dame Théodora était là depuis tellement longtemps que c'était à se demander si elle n'était pas immortelle. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lasst die Leute trauern. Lady Theodora war so lange bei uns, dass wir schon anfingen zu glauben, sie sei unsterblich."
languages.original_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst die Leute trauern. Lady Theodora war so lange bei uns, dass wir schon anfingen zu glauben, sie sei unsterblich."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「悲嘆に暮れさせておきましょう。レディ・シオドーラは私たちと長く共にいすぎた、おかげで彼女がイモータルだと思い始めてたくらいね」
languages.original_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."

traits.locale_text: 「悲嘆に暮れさせておきましょう。レディ・シオドーラは私たちと長く共にいすぎた、おかげで彼女がイモータルだと思い始めてたくらいね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Deje que la gente llore. Lady Theodora llevaba tanto tiempo entre nosotros que empezábamos a pensar que era inmortal».
languages.original_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."

traits.locale_text: «Deje que la gente llore. Lady Theodora llevaba tanto tiempo entre nosotros que empezábamos a pensar que era inmortal».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."

languages.text: "Müsaade et, yas tutsunlar. Leydi Theodora öylesine uzun süredir bizimleydi ki onu âdeta ölümsüz sanırdık."
languages.original_text: "Let the people grieve. Lady Theodora was with us so long that we started to believe she was immortal."

traits.locale_text: "Müsaade et, matem tutsunlar. Leydi Theodora öylesine uzun süredir bizimleydi ki âdeta ölümsüz sanırdık."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
